appleSignInError.title: Apple Sign In Error
appleSignInError.unknownMessage:
Unable to sign in with Apple right now.

üì± Possible reasons:
‚Ä¢ You may not be signed in to your iCloud account
‚Ä¢ "Sign in with Apple" may be disabled in your Apple ID settings
‚Ä¢ There may be an internet connection issue

üí° Solution:
Check Settings ‚Üí Apple ID ‚Üí Password & Security ‚Üí Sign in with Apple.
appleSignInError.networkMessage: Please check your internet connection and try again.
appleSignInError.validationMessage:
Apple authentication failed.

Please try again or sign in with email.
appleSignInError.serverMessage:
Unable to connect to Apple servers.

‚Ä¢ Make sure your iCloud account is active
‚Ä¢ Try again in a few minutes
appleSignInError.genericMessage:
An unexpected error occurred.

You can try signing in with email or try again later.

photoGuide.title: What Should the Ideal Photo Be?
photoGuide.goodLightingDesc: Prefer natural light or a well-lit environment
photoGuide.fullBodyDesc: Your entire body or most of it should be visible
photoGuide.straightPostureDesc: Facing the camera, straight and relaxed stance
photoGuide.avoidDesc: Blurry photos, dark environments, poses where face or body is hidden
photoGuide.cameraPermissionDenied: Camera permission is required. Please grant permission in settings.
photoGuide.galleryPermissionDenied: Gallery permission is required. Please grant permission in settings.
photoGuide.cameraError: An error occurred while opening the camera.
photoGuide.galleryError: An error occurred while opening the gallery.

addGarment.info: If the garment background is flat and clean, AI will give better results.

support.title: Help & Support
support.contactDescription: Contact us with your questions, we'll respond as soon as possible.

howToUse.question: How do I use Veyra?
howToUse.answer: Add your profile photo, select clothes from wardrobe and create your outfit with AI.

credits.question: How do credits work?
credits.answer: Each outfit generation costs 1 credit. Premium members can generate unlimited outfits.

quality.question: How to get the best results?
quality.answer: Well-lit, full-body photos with a straight posture give the best results.

refund.question: What is your refund policy?
refund.answer: You can request a refund through the App Store within 14 days of purchase.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: At Veyra, we care about your privacy. This policy explains how we collect, use and protect your data.

dataUsage.title: Data Usage
dataUsage.item1: We process your photos for outfit generation
dataUsage.item2: We use it to improve app experience
dataUsage.item3: We don't share with third parties

dataSecurity.title: Data Security
dataSecurity.item2: Industry standard security protocols are used

userRights.title: User Rights
userRights.item1: You can request access to your data
userRights.item2: You can request deletion of your data
userRights.item3: You can close your account at any time
